title: Capricorn Coast Self-Contained Oceanfront Villas for Up to Four Guests with Breakfast Hamper
description:
Sunny and untouched Yeppoon is at your fingertips with a stay at these laidback beachfront villas, now under new management, with stunning views over the Coral Sea and Great Keppel Island. Spend your days exploring the wonders of the Southern Great Barrier Reef region, and return to enjoy all the comforts of home, including a private terrace, fully equipped kitchen and living room.

There’s no shortage of things to see and do around Yeppoon - you’ll be just moments away from Yeppoon Beach, while the famed Capricorn Caves are just a 30-minute drive away. Adventures on the Great Barrier Reef and Great Keppel Island are also easily had. Return for a dip in the hotel’s pool - a wonderful place to savour the Capricorn Coast’s signature sunset.

title: Capricorn Coast Self-Contained Oceanfront Apartments with Breakfast Hamper
description:
This laidback apartment stay, now under new leadership, is a true hidden gem: slow down, take a deep breath and savour seaside serenity in the heart of Queensland's spectacular Capricorn Coast. With showstopping views over the Coral Sea and Great Keppel Island from the comfort of your private balcony, you're sure to fall in love with the Southern Great Barrier Reef region.

There’s no shortage of things to see or do around Yeppoon - you’ll be just moments away from Yeppoon Beach, and the famed Capricorn Caves are just a 30-minute drive away. Adventures on the Great Barrier Reef and Great Keppel Island are also easily had. Return for a dip in the hotel’s pool - a wonderful place to savour the Capricorn Coast’s signature sunset.
